clini is an app designed to streamline the extraction of medical data from clinical documents, and generate patient-friendly reports using AI.

Medical test results need to be relayed in a way that is clear and easy to understand, and with interpretation and advice based on the recipient's particular issues.

The clini app allows test results and other medical information to be built into a detailed and professional report which can be shared. All data is encrypted and no data is stored, once the report is done.
